ygData.subject: Re: 8th level pet
ygData.msgSnippet: If you are invisible and wondering if things can see you, /con them.  If it says Ready to Attack stay away, it can see you.  If it says looks at you
ygData.messageBody:
If you are invisible and wondering if things can see you, /con them. If
it says "Ready to Attack" stay away, it can see you. If it says "looks
at you indifferently" you are OK. When I right clicked on a vendor to
buy/sell my inviso went away and I was surprised!

duration I've heard is either extremly short or very long. If you wait
a moment to see if the spell will wear off before proceeding this is
probably safer.

-----Original Message-----
From: Ben Setala [mailto:onlyanembryo@...]
Sent: Sunday, May 09, 1999 7:13 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] 8th level pet


From: Ben Setala <onlyanembryo@...>

I believe the duration of Invisiblity is random, I've had it last for a
super long time, and other times it's gone before I can count to 50.
Had an a little sight seeing adventure in Castle Mistmoore when I found
that out :) Took me two days to get my body back, I was VERY deep
inside when the invisibilty wore off.
As for Highhold, I went at 8th level and passed right by that orc while
Invisible with him none the wiser that I was there. My best guess is
that indeed your invisiblity ran out, it happens quite abruptly, you
don't usually even see it blink.

--- Ric R <redr@...> wrote:
> From: Ric R <redr@...>
>
> I am sorry to say, chances are your invso failed,
> and the orc jumped you
> right off. I've had invso drop without notice
> before, as a matter a fact,
> only twice since EQ went production (march 17) I've
> had invso last for the
> full durration.
>
>
> Telan Ka`Rlaah
>
>
>
> At 06:21 PM 5/8/99 -0000, you wrote:
> >From: rival@...
> >
> >I'm sorry if this message sounds bad, but i love
> the game, just a little
> upset right now. I finally made 8th level, and so
> off I go to get my pet
> spell. I had read many reports on this list, so I
> thought myself prepared.
> After about an hour and a half trip from Felwithe,
> I finally reach High
> Hold Pass. My invisibility still going strong, I
> procede in a short
> distance only to be rooted and killed by some
> #@!!@#$ orc who could see
> invisible. I came from Kithicor forest. Was I just
> unlucky? Is there
> another better way in, other than through kithicor?
> That place is insane.
> How do they expect us to ever get a pet at this
> level? I've been hearing
> Mages whine about have to research 24th level pets.
> How about getting
> screwed out of 8th level. If my bitching is
> unfounded, please tell me. I
> will appologize. If there is an easier way, or I
> just got unlucky, let me
> know. Please.
> >
>
